titles.title: Prohibiting the use of a Members' representational allowance to obtain advertising on any Internet site other than an official site of the Member involved.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 12/1/2011--Introduced. Prohibits any portion of a Members' representational allowance from being used to obtain advertising on any Internet site other than an official site of the Member involved.
